Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist. #9 -- 10.38 Mill - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT NO. 9 PROPOSITION
 (TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 10.38 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR MAINTAINING AND OPERATING THE DISTRICT'S FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES AND FOR PURCHASING FIRE FIGHTING EQUIPMENT NECESSARY AND INCIDENTAL THERETO.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 9 of the Parish of Livingston, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of ten and thirty-eight hundredths mills (10.38) (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $94,000) on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of maintaining and operating the District's fire protection facilities and for purchasing fire fighting equipment necessary and incidental thereto?
